home.title: Hi, I'm
home.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
home.description: A passionate full-stack developer dedicated to creating high-quality user experiences and scalable technical solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am an experienced full-stack developer skilled in using modern technology stacks to solve complex technical challenges. My career began at a well-known internet company where I built a solid technical foundation.
about.description2: In my work, I focus not only on technical depth but also on how to transform technology into real business value. I believe continuous learning and technical innovation are key to maintaining competitiveness.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you're interested in my experience or have any opportunities for collaboration, feel free to contact me.
contact.error: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
